entry.title: Pieces of me
entry.summary:
Author: RiversLastSong93

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,943Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 5

Summary: Buck never thought it would come to this—bleeding on the kitchen floor, barely conscious, after another one of Tommy’s outbursts turned brutal. But this time, Tommy didn’t stop. He didn’t help. He just left.When Eddie gets the call that Buck's in a coma, everything else falls away. The only thing that matters is making sure Buck survives—and that Tommy never gets near him again. As Buck begins to heal, physically and emotionally, the walls he’s been forced to build start to crack. And maybe, just maybe, Eddie can help him find his way back to the man he used to be.
